data.description:
CO2 Plus reports the concentration of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, as measured by the U.S. NOAA's Mauna Loa Observatory [1].
The first value is the previous week's average, and the second value is the weekly average taken a year ago.
This watchface uses the API developed by HQCasanova [2].
CO2 Plus is configurable, allowing the user to choose from 6 date modes encompassing U.S. and European formats.

[1] http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/gmd/ccgg/trends/weekly.html
[2] http://www.hqcasanova.com/en/projects/co2.php

latest_release.release_notes: v1.3 - Update for corrected CO2 feed.

data.title: CO2 Plus

data.author: Sam Jerichow

changelog.release_notes: Sector is now available for the original Pebble and the Steel.

data.description:
Summary: radial hatching analog time telling
Readability: medium
Examples: 12:00-11:55 in a loop, 05:05, 06:55, 11:30, 02:40 (default, red PT, gold PTS)

Sector is a somewhat minimalistic watchface that plays with angles and shades. You read it like an analog watch, except the hours are told precisely, not gradually. You will encounter differently hatched/shaded areas that tell the time. These areas start at the 12h position and grow clockwise. A 100% dense area is hours and minutes overlapping. Hours are 75% shaded. Minutes are 25% shaded. (75%+25%=100%) So you never see those two shades at the same time. It's either 100% and 75% or 100% and 25%, because it's either the hours or the minutes that leave the overlap. So remember, the 100% area is always the opposite of what left the overlap. This sounds more complicated than it is. 0% is just the background. For watches with black bezels, the background is also black while the drawing colour is white. For watches whith white bezels, the colors are swapped. 

Design / Programming / Copyright © 2013, 2015 Sam Jerichow

latest_release.release_notes: Sector is now available for the original Pebble and the Steel.

data.title: Sector

data.author: Unbound

changelog.release_notes:
- messaging bugfix
- option to inhibit weather updates while user is asleep (enabled by default)

- updated for 3.13
- improved reliability of messaging (weather updates)
- reduced frequency of attempts when messaging fails
- adjusted weather update frequency to match openweathermap update frequency

- changed default colors
- weather can now be disabled entirely or set to hide when stale
- changing configuration will no longer force weather to be considered up-to-date
- improved icon rendering (especially when selected colors have no intermediate shades)
- fixed setting the foreground color for time

- updated for 3.8
- more color customization
- various optimizations

- configurable colors
- slightly reduced frequency of location updates
- various minor optimizations

- improved reliability of messaging
- menu icon
- only rerender parts of screen that have changed
- reload weather icon only when it changes
- updating configuration will no longer fail if weather can't be updated

- date uses system locale
- option for alternative date format
- weather no longer updates every launch, but otherwise more often

- more icons
- corrected centering of weather
- fixed crash when weather conditions have unknown value

data.description:
Get in the Christmas spirit. A simple watchface with an animated snow shower. Hours of mesmerizing fun watching the flakes fall, one by one, building a wondrous winter scene. The snow is random so no two snowfalls are the same (display resets when snow reaches the top). We even got some pseudo pebble physics going on here!

The battery level is shown by the closing blind in the attic and the day of the month just below the roof.

Shake your pebble for...  Number of sleeps until the special day (configurable) which is VERY important, Date, Full battery status, Bluetooth connection status.

latest_release.release_notes: Tiny change to add the menu icon

big/small temp

data.description:
The original idea for this simple watchface came from another project i'm working on - creating a world map (in three parts, each about 2m high x 1.5m wide).  So this is obviously a much much smaller and less detailed version. The larger map uses free data from http://www.naturalearthdata.com/  and will be ideal as a wall map/mural.  More info is at, http://www.themapman.com/mapportfolio.html


The main feature of this watchface is that the map style changes at 6am/6pm from a day map to a night map, with your current timezone displayed above.  

Weather is via Yahoo  (and has generally been working ok for me during testing).  When BT is disconnected the weather graphics disappear and there is a small x. Option for a big or small temp number.

The watchface has been developed to run on all pebble watches. As the watch displays timezone info, default text is displayed on classic pebbles, which do not know about timezones.

Ps: At this stage i don't plan adding day/night shadows (or similar) as there are a few other watchfaces that do this, and here i'd like to keep the whole map unobscured.

latest_release.release_notes: fixed temp aplite

data.title: Natural Earth

data.description:
Advent, Advent ein Lichtlein brennt. Erst Eins, dann Zwei, dann Drei, dann Vier, dann steht das Christkind vor der Tür.

Mit dem Adventskranz Watchface verwandelt ihr eure Pebble ein einen digitalen Adventskranz. Jeden Adventsonntag, entzündet sich eine weitere Kerze um euch auf Weihnachten, Weihnachtsmarkt, das Christkind und den Weihnachtsmann einzustimmen.

Viel Freude und einen besinnlichen Advent mit Kerzenschein ohne Brandgefahr!
***********************************
Christmas Countdown

With this classic watchface you will transform your Pebble into a digital advent wreath. Every sunday, starting with the 29th of November, another candle ignites to get you into the right mood for Christmas, Christmas markets, Father Christmas and Santa Claus.

Advent Advent, a little light burns, first One, then Two, then Three, then Four, then the Christ Child stands in front of the door. 

Enjoy a quiet christmas season with candlelight without risk of fire.

latest_release.release_notes: - Date update 2018

data.title: Adventskranz / Advent wreath

data.author: pebblefan.com

changelog.release_notes:
今天Fitbit正式宣布收购Pebble，我们加入如下更新，
1、添加了后面几年的节日和节气信息
2、添加了是否显示秒的选项

加入晃动灵敏度选项
天气自动更新加强
黑白表也支持健康监测了（本次暂时先支持运动步数和能量消耗）

1、彩屏手表加入转换成黑白色开关，可以自由在黑白和彩色配色方案之间切换
2、加入夜间天气图标（有月亮了）
拥抱健康！彩屏用户增加健康功能，包括 步数、运动距离、运动时间、消耗能量、睡眠、深度睡眠众多指数显示
加入全球气象台支持，可以全球使用了

1、修复空气质量没有时显示的问题
2、修复多次更新问题
内存继续优化

1、修复没有手机时切换表盘计时间功能停走问题 
2、优化内存和电量
3、修复有时报错的问题

1、将数时间功能从手机端计算移到手表端计算，去掉手表和手机间的交互，省电不止一半以上！
2、设置中加入当前版本号显示
3、内存优化

1、数日子功能强化，支持到时分秒，计数方式多样选择
2、黑白屏颜色增加全黑全白无分隔线选项
黑白表颜色选项里面添加了全黑和全白选项，很酷的，去试试吧！
修复中到大雨转阵雨天气图标不显示的问题
黑白表加入了反色显示选项
修复天气信息返回过长没法显示的问题
为黑白屏表继续优化内存
修复ps晃动多次可能报错问题

中国面子3之5.0版——您的专属表盘

一天一色一心情，一表一盘配一人;
陪你哭、陪你笑、陪你伤心陪你乐；
无论你是阳光帅气型，成熟魅力型，高贵脱俗型，青春可爱型，还是神秘浪漫型，总有一款专属于你!

中国面子3多元化配色版，经过了设计师对大家提出的各大优秀配色表盘的参考对比，设计出了多种配色方案，再经过精心筛选亲自试用，终于与大家见面了。

同时实现了颜色设置保存后立即在表盘显示，不需要再晃动刷新啦。

希望大家能够喜欢，也欢迎多多提意见！


卵石坊
小卵石一直在努力！
简化内存占用
修复3.11下ps可能报错的问题

Support all world cities!

一天一色一心情，一表一盘配一人;
陪你哭、陪你笑、陪你伤心陪你乐；
无论你是阳光帅气型，成熟魅力型，高贵脱俗型，青春可爱型，还是神秘浪漫型，总有一款专属于你!

中国面子3多元化配色版，经过了设计师对大家提出的各大优秀配色表盘的参考对比，设计出了多种配色方案，再经过精心筛选亲自试用，终于与大家见面了。

同时实现了颜色设置保存后立即在表盘显示，不需要再晃动刷新啦。

希望大家能够喜欢，也欢迎多多提意见！


卵石坊
小卵石一直在努力！



中国面子3之4.0版（让你的timeline带你飞！）

本次版本包括
1、增加timeline定制区，本次先提供常用英语口语短句记忆，后面会添加更多的可能！欢迎大家踊跃建议！
2、加入晃动开关功能，关闭晃动后就不会切换到3天天气界面了。运动时不会晃来晃去了！
3、加入12和24小时开关切换选项，选择哪个随你喜欢！
4、当遇到节日和节气时，节日名称将和农历一起显示，两个可以同时看了！

中国面子3之3.0版开创信息窗新概念，功能还在持续添加中！

本次版本包括
1、独创信息窗配置功能，可配置数日子、备忘录、当天天气选项
2、数日子可以算出距某天已经过了多久（再也不怕大妈问：你孩子多大了？）
3、数日子可以计算到某一天还有多久（离马拉松没几天了，还不好好练下？）
4、备忘录允许你设置单行备忘也支持双行备忘（具体你拿来记什么，你随意！）
5、信息窗设为当天天气，可以直接显示，同时依然支持摇晃后显示未来天气

请强烈点赞红星支持该国产应用！
关注我们卵石坊的微信号:  pebblecn 了解更多pebble精彩应用！

latest_release.release_notes:
今天Fitbit正式宣布收购Pebble，我们加入如下更新，
1、添加了后面几年的节日和节气信息
2、添加了是否显示秒的选项

data.title: 中国面子3(农历,久坐提醒,天气,PM25,备忘,纪念日,定时,CHINESE FACE, China Face)

data.description:
This is the rewritten version of Color Watch for Pebble Time. It is inspired by the Color watchface of the Apple Watch.  

Shows: 
- digital time 
- analog time 
- date 
- current temperature
- battery percentage 

Options: 
- enable/disable second hand
- choose between 17 colors for the watchface
- select your individual monogram (up to 4 characters)
- temperature in C or F

No further updates or support... I've sold my Pebble! Sorry.

MorbidMeter for Pebble v1.3 Release Notes
Changes since v1.2

* Configuration now uses Pebble Clay
* Fixed bug in One Month timescale

MorbidMeter for Pebble v1.2 Release Notes
Changes since v1.1
* Squashed bug that would lose data when changing between watchfaces
Changes since v1.0
* All timescales can support time durations up to 136 years, most more
* Messages for time durations out of range
* X_UNIVERSE timescale modified, Pebble doesn't provide calendar support for 6000 year time periods

MorbidMeter for Pebble v1.1 Release Notes
Changes since v1.0
* All timescales can support time durations up to 136 years, most more
* Messages for time durations out of range
* X_UNIVERSE timescale modified, Pebble doesn't provide calendar support for a 6000 year date range

MorbidMeter for Pebble v1.0
* Initial release!

data.description: MorbidMeter for Pebble is a countdown (or count up!) watchface, but more entertaining than most such beasts.  Set start and end dates and times, and then select what timescale to display.  You can select a traditional countdown of days, hours, minutes and seconds remaining, or get creative.  Measure your time interval over the course of a single hour, day, month or year.  Display the interval as a percentage done or remaining.  Even stretch your interval over the 15 billion years since the Big Bang! Select Fracture Time and have the watch display a random instant from your time interval.  Why is it morbid?  It was originally developed to transpose a whole lifetime to a single day, year, or even one hour.  You can use it like that if you want, or as a more mundane timer.  You can shake your wrist and switch from your timer to real time.  If your response still is Huh? then please check out our website for more details.

latest_release.release_notes:
MorbidMeter for Pebble v1.3 Release Notes
Changes since v1.2
* Added Fracture Time option - see description for more details
* Configuration now uses Pebble Clay
* Fixed bug in One Month timescale

data.title: MorbidMeter

data.description:
Watchface based on a Printed Circuit Board (PCB).

At the top are 12 contact points are the hours markers, the middle 5 are the 10-minute markers and the bottom 9 are the single minute markers.
The lines join these up, giving the circuit board appearance.

Configuration options to change the connector and line color and to set the background to white.

Notes.
- On the hour, just the line from the hour is shown
- At midnight and midday, no lines show

Screenshots: 3:44, 6:21, 8:33, 4:37 and an explanatory image


Design created by László Scheffer, from Hungary, and is published with the designer’s permission.

The original design appeared on the Tokyoflash Design Studio in 2012 and can be found here:
http://blog.tokyoflash.com/2012/12/18/pcb-watch-wrist-circuitry/

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble 2 and Quick Views.

data.title: PCB

No silly animations - no unnecessary information.

Just the time! ( and the date if you want to )

Stymple 2's key features are:

* colors are completely customizable 
* anti-aliased digits for smooth appearance
* optional date and battery state 
* haptic and visual notification of Bluetooth changes
* localized date format for all supported languages 
* 12 hour format support 
* low energy consumption

data.description:
You don't have to be a card shark to enjoy playing cards. Now you can tell time with them too! Each minute, you'll get a 3 card deal: the first card is the hour, and the next two cards are the "tens" and "ones" digits of the minute.

Ace reads as "1", King as "0", Jack as "11" and Queen as "12".

Times for the screen shots are (left to right): 10:40, 2:37, 11:47, and 12:01.

latest_release.release_notes: Release 1.01: Better battery performance. (Change timer update to every Minute.)

changelog.release_notes: First Release! Includes base watch face along with some mathematical smoothing.

data.description:
A stylistic and simplistic watch face that displays the time using 4 circles of decreasing size. The smallest circle is the second hand, moving along the circumference of the next largest circle. This larger circle is the minute hand, which moves along the circumference of the second largest circle. The second largest circle is - you guessed it - the hour hand, and moves along the circumference of a stationary circle.
Still confused? Try it out and see it in motion!

latest_release.release_notes: First Release! Includes base watch face along with some mathematical smoothing.

data.author: Ray Elliott

changelog.release_notes: Added support for 24-hour clock based on user's preference.

Removed 'connection_service_peek_pebblekit_connection()' bluetooth poll because it was always returning true on the APLITE emulator, and a user complained that the bluetooth connection was always showing as connected on their B/W Pebble. I don't have a B/W to test with.

Added day-of-week to display.

Use both app connection and PebbleKit connection to determine if bluetooth connection is up.
Updated connection service functions to match new names introduced in SDK 3.0. Requires watch firmware v3.8 or greater.

data.description:
Based on "Simplicity", this watchface shows the date, time, am/pm, bluetooth connection status, and battery status.

Short double-vibe indicates when bluetooth connection has been lost. Also the line between the date and time changes to red when not connected.

The watchface was designed to be efficient with the battery, no extra screen changes and double-vibe will not happen more than once in a 10-minute period.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for 24-hour clock based on user's preference.

data.author: Super Yeh

changelog.release_notes: 修正农历正月农历年之错误

无背景数位屏保的美化。
（有背景的数位屏保保持现状）
取消单色屏屏保背景(随意圆心)的选项。
取消彩色屏的时间颜色设定选择。
（颜色与天气栏位字体颜色相同）
再度放大天气预测的天气图标和高低温字体。
增加超高温（30度）和超低温（10度）时，气温以粗体显示。
修正行程到期10分钟前未提醒的错误。

时间字体统一大小，排版略为修改。
自动检测中文编码并转换，以解决中文乱码问题。
增加滑动换页动画效果。
增加股票查询，备忘查询，和行程查询及提醒功能。
增加转腕切屏时资讯栏位是否跑动显示的选项。
增加一个转腕次数自动的选项，平常使用一次转腕，于屏保返回需两次转腕，以减少平时活动对表盘（屏保）的干扰。
增加穿衣、运动、洗车、晾晒的天气资讯选项。
增加屏保的时间样式选择。
单色屏屏保增加图形背景选择。
加入转腕一次或两次的选项。

对PT及PTS的屏保画面做美化。
(可于设定页选择)

引入screen saver(屏保)观念，超过1分钟未使用转腕，自动进入屏保（简单时间）。
再次转腕使用时回复。

增加快递查询功能。

增加pebble health资料显示（于天气更新时间栏位）。
（仅PT以上适用）

时间字体粗化，以提高辨识度。

取消天气每小时更新选项，改为自动，
若距离上次更新小于1小时内，则不更新，以减少不必要的更新。
天气超过1小时未更新，天气图标会以淡化处理显示。

跑马灯判断显示字句长短，跑完即返回。
资料更新后，跑马灯才起作用。

修正干支时间的时柱未及时更新错误。
若干布局小修正以美观。
fix bugs
时间字体修改一致

增加主表盘选项
增加干支时间选项
增加空气品质图形化识别区分

小改版面，空气品质还以文字显示。
温度及天气字体放大。
单色版本增加个别栏位反白（白底黑字）选择。

修正电量和蓝牙颜色设定错误
修正跑马灯底色
增加导航信息（第一段路程）跑马灯显示

大改版，界面及使用方法改变。
主屏显示日期，天气及月历。
甩屏画面有：天气预报，黄历吉忌，地址导航。
甩屏一次变换画面，再甩屏一次回主屏画面。
彩色版地址导航画面采用地图显示。

黄历资料固定每日23时软件自行更新，
并发布到TimeLine上分享（测试功能）
天气预报可选每小时更新，
软件于每日8时自动更新。
fix bugs
彩色屛的PT或PTS，色彩布局稍微变化。
修正离开表盘返回后未更新的问题。

修正单色表盘反白后不显示电量问题
修正彩色表盘的颜色选项值的问题
配套软件请使用1.5版
精简并增加单色表盘反白选项。

修正黄历及阴历的小错误
未来天气改为曲线显示五天

data.description:
ONLY USE IN CHINA
(need chinese font)

简易的资讯表盘。
主画面分别显示时间、天气、资讯三个栏位。

各项特点如下：

1.简洁屏保
具有屏保设计，超过1分钟未使用（转腕），自动进入简单数字时间显示，再次转腕回复主画面。

2.资讯查询
资讯栏位可经由转腕切换，
转动腕表次数可于设定页设定。
转屏资讯有：
A.月历
B.天气预测 (于设定页自行设定查询的中国城市）
C.中国黄历吉忌冲煞查询 (查询后将发送明日吉忌资料到时间轴)。
D.地址查询 (以GPS查询现在所在地地址）
E.导航指引 (到预设目的地的第一步指引，需在设定页地图上选择目的地。)
F.资料查询（快递、行程、备忘、股票等。）
G.行程于到期及前1小时、10分钟会振动及自动显示提醒。

3.天气预测
天气自动每小时更新，是否及时更新可由天气图标判断，超过一小时未更新，则图标将淡化处理。
空气品质依(优、良)、(轻、中)、(重、劣)三级，分别以圆形、方形及叉形图标区别显示。
可选择防晒、穿衣、运动、洗车、晒晾等天气讯息显示。

4.活动数据
可选择显示运动数据(步数、时间、距离、热量：四选一)以取代天气更新时间。(仅PT以上版本可用)

5.时间特色
日期栏显示西历及农历日期。
时间栏位可选择：指针式、数位式或干支四柱显示。

6.整点提醒
可选择开启或关闭整点振动及蓝牙断连振动，及使用的时段(相反即为勿扰时段)。

7.色彩自定
P或PS可设定表盘反白与否。
PT或PTS可自定表盘的颜色。

data.description:
Get your time through a rolling odometer-style watchface. From tenths of a minute through to the year, all fields "roll with the changes", just like an old style car odometer. Includes configuration of background color.

PLEASE NOTE: By default, this watchface is continually in motion which will have an impact on your battery life. A number of settings on the configuration page allow you to significantly extend your battery life by restricting animation when you're sleeping, only when minutes change, or only when your Pebble is tapped.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix improperly "fast scrolling" digits.

changelog.release_notes: -- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4
-- Improved method for checking elapsed time since last weather update
-- Switched weather provider from Yahoo! Weather to OpenWeatherMap.org
- Added an option to always display a seconds hand
- Slightly lengthened the watch hands
- Fixed an issue with retrieving Yahoo! Weather using GPS (credit: Freakified)
- Improvements to battery usage
- Added option to shake to briefly display a seconds hand
-- Updated to display "....." for "Unknown" Yahoo! Weather conditions
-- Fixed an issue when Yahoo! Weather returned an 'Unknown' weather condition
- Added an option to use thinner watch hands
- Added option to display hour markers as numeric values

data.description:
A highly configurable analog watchface containing weather information and optional date/battery display lines.

- Select colors for watch hands, time markers, background and text items
- Select how often OpenWeatherMap.org weather information is updated
- Retrieve weather information using GPS or by manually entering location
- Option to display today's lo - hi temperatures (+last weather update time)
- Display hour markers as numeric values
- Option to always display a seconds hand, or battery-friendly alternative to briefly display a seconds hand with a shake
- Option to use watch hands with a thinner width
- Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect option
- Options to display time in digital format and battery percentage

If you're enjoying the ANALOG WD watchface, please click the heart above. You may also send feedback using the Support link below.

latest_release.release_notes: -- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4

data.title: Analog Weather

data.description:
This watch face shows you the current time in two ways : numeric and analogic.
On the left, you find the date and weekday.
On the right, the week number.
On the bottom : battery level and Bluetooth status.
Colors are different for every day of the week (black and white for Pebble). 
At night (6.00 pm to 8.00 am), colors are changed to more contrasted ones.
This first version does not have, for instant, configuration feature.

latest_release.release_notes: v1.2 : fix minor problem for minute hand color at night

data.description: Hour is at bottom center of screen (supports 24-hour format).  Minutes are read in upper-left corner.  Each full triangle represents 10 minutes, each filled square 1 minute.  Month date to the upper right of hour.  Lower-right corner represents battery level.  Black square in lower-left corner will display on Bluetooth disconnect.  Vibrates on Bluetooth connect/disconnect.

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

A very battery efficient face with great color customization. We designed and developed this face to bring a classy look but with great color customizable; without draining the precious battery of your watch. Change all the colors, and toggle the battery indicator and date on/off. Enjoy!

Top Features Include:

-Customize all colors
-A grade battery rating
-Toggle date/battery indicator on/off
-Pebble OG Support, Pebble Time Support, and Pebble Time Round Support
